title: Pasta with Salad
introduction: Pasta with Salad is an invigorating and refreshing summer dish that combines the heartiness of pasta with the freshness of a vegetable salad. Ideal for warm weather, this dish retains the bright flavors and crisp textures of the vegetables, creating a light yet satisfying meal.
ingredients: 1 medium fennel bulb, trimmed and cut into bite-size pieces
2 tablespoons basil cut into thin ribbons
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 cups trimmed arugula, torn into bite-size pieces
instructions: In a large serving bowl, combine the tomatoes, fennel, onion, olive oil, basil, and salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Top with arugula.

Bring at least 4 quarts of water to a boil in a large pot. Add 2 tablespoons of salt, then the pasta. Cook over high heat, stirring frequently, until the pasta is al dente, tender yet firm to the bite. Set aside some of the cooking water. Drain the pasta.
Toss the pasta with the salad mixture. Add a little of the cooking water if the pasta seems dry. Serve immediately.
